#text=Baking a cake can be a lot of fun .
#text=Plus , at the end , you have a yummy cake to eat !
#text=First , decide what kind of cake to make .
#text=Do you have a recipe written down ?
#text=A recipe is a set of instructions for making a particular cake .
#text=Make sure to read the recipe all the way through before you start , so there are no surprises !
#text=Then gather all your ingredients together : flour , sugar , eggs , and whatever else your recipe says .
#text=Next , you need to pre-heat the oven .
#text=Your recipe will tell you what temperature to use .
#text=While the oven heats up , you mix your ingredients in a big bowl .
#text=Next , you need to prepare the baking pans .
#text=It will tell you what size pan to use , and whether it needs to be greased .
#text=To grease a pan means to put a thin layer of shortening or butter on the bottom and sides , so the cake wo n't stick .
#text=You 'll use two pans if you 're making a layered cake .
#text=When the pan or pans are ready , pour in the well-mixed ingredients .
#text=Check if the oven is hot enough -- has it reached the temperature you set it to yet ?
#text=If so , slide your pan right into the middle of the oven , and close it up .
#text=The recipe will say how many minutes it will take for the cake to bake .
#text=It 's a good idea to set a timer , because you do n't want to forget about it , and have a burnt cake , after all your hard work !
#text=While the cake cooks , it 's a good idea to clean up the kitchen .
#text=When your timer goes off , you can check if the cake is done by sticking a toothpick into the middle .
#text=If the toothpick comes out dry , and not gooey , your cake is done .
#text=Turn off the oven , and carefully remove the hot cake with oven mitts on .
#text=Unfortunately , now you have to leave it alone until it cools .
#text=When it 's cooled , turn it out of the pan , and put the frosting on , if your cake is a frosted cake .
#text=Next is the best part : slice that cake into eight , put a slice on a plate , and enjoy !
